EmailTemplate.name: Reserved Name Consent/Cancel
EmailTemplate.subject: Reserved Name Consent/Cancel
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom for your order. You currently have your chosen Limited Liability Company reserved in the state of filing. Please follow the steps listed below to complete your order.
Next steps: • Do not make any changes to the attached document as it will result in delays with your order. If you need to make changes, please contact our Customer Care Team. • Print two (2) copies of all attached documents on white paper using black ink. Please do not use color ink. • Please have the Reserved Name Holder sign his/her name in black ink on all copies where indicated. • Additional fees may be required for filing Consent/Cancellation form. Legalzooom will notify you directly of any requisite charges. • Mail the documents to our address listed below.
Courier Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd. 10th Flr. Glendale, CA 91203
USPS Deliveries LegalZoom.com, Inc. ATTN: Business Filings 101 North Brand Blvd., 10th Flr. POB 29096 Glendale, CA 91203
If you have any questions regarding your order, please contact our {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} at {!snippetVariable.ccphone} or customercare@legalzoom.com. Please include your order number in your correspondences for prompt service.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
